name: MOTHER: Cognitive Dissonance
summary: MOTHER: Cognitive Dissonance is a fan-made game set in the Mother series universe, taking place between the events of Earthbound Beginnings (Mother) and Earthbound (Mother 2). It follows the story of the Applechasers, a ragtag pile of aliens brought together to keep the Apple of Enlightenment out of Giegue's reach. Along the way you meet lots of new & old friends, explore the solar system, and witness the universe's lore unfold all while participating in some serious alien-on-alien brawls
info:
• 别名: mother1.5
  • 平台: PC
  • 游戏类型: RPG
  • 游玩人数: 1
  • 发行日期: 2014
  • 开发: Toby Fox and Space Pickle
